thread.title: 15 Photos That Prove the Azores Should Be Your Next Travel Destination

author: Macy Williams
title: 15 Photos That Prove the Azores Should Be Your Next Travel Destination
text:
The Azores Islands Travel Inspiration 15 Photos That Prove the Azores Should Be Your Next Travel Destination January 18, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 15 Photos That Prove the Azores Should Be Your Next Travel Destination 
The Azores are going to be all you hear about this year, and for good reason. The archipelago of nine volcanic islands is a part of Portugal. Located in the North Atlantic ocean, the lush wildlife, blue waters, and charming towns make it a desirable vacation destination — travel bloggers are already flocking to the islands. The best part is that the Azores are only a four-hour flight from parts of America's East Coast. If you're wondering what it's like to visit the Azores, we rounded up some gorgeous photos from travelers' experiences. Check them out! Related:
